attributes.action: investigate the lack of funding to facilitate sex offender group treatment in the community
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I had 5 years experience of working with Sexual Offenders in the community, facilitating the Community Sexual Offenders groupwork Programme for the Probation Service in London and have recently been compulsorily reassigned to another field of work.   LP failed to carry out its drastic plans to reduce the number of faciltators but,  Nevertheless, the C-SOGP unit is under performing due to a chronic lack of funding.  If the Public knew that the very offenders they are most fearful of are waiting up to a year to get on a programme, then there would of course be a national outcry.  More resources should be put into this important work, which is what the public would require.
Peter Stewart
